text: The Men's keirin competition at the 2017 World Championships was held on 13 April 2017. ==Results== ===First round=== The first two riders in each heat qualified to the second round, all other riders advanced to the first round repechages. ====Heat 1==== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" |- !
